page.title: 12Tourism in Fraserburgh
page.content: If you like sports or just like holidays in a nice quiet place then Fraserburgh's just the place for you. It has a luxurious beach which extends for about 4 Km. It has fine, clean sand and the water is usually calm. A few years ago the surfing championships were held in Fraserburgh. Above the beach there are tearooms, toilets, a paddling pool, mini train, swings, a climbing frame, fireman's pole and a rocking horse. You could go sailing. There is a caravan site. There is a large dune called "Tiger Hill". There is an l8 hole golf course. If you go for a swim you must be a good swimmer because there are strong currents. Beside the beach there's a caravan site. There is also a harbour where you can watch the fishing boats. So now you know about it, why not come for a holiday?
